data.text:
It had been a while since I had become Copano Rickey's trainer. 
Today, Copano Rickey was staring directly at my face.
data.processed:
<story>It had been a while since I had become Copano Rickey's trainer. 
<story>Today, Copano Rickey was staring directly at my face.

data.text: Trainer, are you feeling kind of tired?
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed: <story>Trainer, are you feeling kind of tired?

data.text:
Your face seems a little pale, and I'll bet your head is feeling 
kind of heavy, right? For a while now, you've been leaning 
forward and holding your head.
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>Your face seems a little pale, and I'll bet your head is feeling 
<story>kind of heavy, right? For a while now, you've been leaning 
<story>forward and holding your head.

data.text:
I didn't realize it but……now that she mentions 
it, my head was starting to hurt, and it felt 
like things were getting a little hazy.
data.processed:
<story>I didn't realize it but……now that she mentions 
<story>it, my head was starting to hurt, and it felt 
<story>like things were getting a little hazy.

data.text:
So, it seems like you don't know? Hmmmm, 
if it's unconsciously……then maybe it's something 
physical like your 『Dwelling』.
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>So, it seems like you don't know? Hmmmm, 
<story>if it's unconsciously……then maybe it's something 
<story>physical like your 『Dwelling』.

data.text:
There doesn't seem to be anything wrong with the trainers' room…… 
that means the cause is probably in the dorm!
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>There doesn't seem to be anything wrong with the trainers' room…… 
<story>that means the cause is probably in the dorm!

data.text:
Alright! Well, there's no time like the present! 
It's time for Rickey's surprise Feng Shui check! Let's go!
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>Alright! Well, there's no time like the present! 
<story>It's time for Rickey's surprise Feng Shui check! Let's go!

data.text:
And with that, since I had no reason to stop her, 
the surprise Feng Shui check started.
data.processed:
<story>And with that, since I had no reason to stop her, 
<story>the surprise Feng Shui check started.

data.text: ……Hmmm, hmm, hmm, I see……
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed: <story>……Hmmm, hmm, hmm, I see……

data.text:
Aha, like I thought, there really is an issue! Seems like it's 
mostly around the bed. Ah, but I don't mean it's dirty though! 
It's perfectly clean☆
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>Aha, like I thought, there really is an issue! Seems like it's 
<story>mostly around the bed. Ah, but I don't mean it's dirty though! 
<story>It's perfectly clean☆

data.text:
It's just, in regards to Feng Shui, there's a bunch of places 
here and there that could be rearranged to increase luck!
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>It's just, in regards to Feng Shui, there's a bunch of places 
<story>here and there that could be rearranged to increase luck!

data.text:
To be more specific, using that towel as a pillow cover. I 
understand that it's convenient, but it can decrease one's own 
luck in regards to business.
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>To be more specific, using that towel as a pillow cover. I 
<story>understand that it's convenient, but it can decrease one's own 
<story>luck in regards to business.

data.text:
And the curtains and bed covers both having 
patterns isn't that good either. When the sunlight 
is strong, the pattern might ruin the balance.
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>And the curtains and bed covers both having 
<story>patterns isn't that good either. When the sunlight 
<story>is strong, the pattern might ruin the balance.

data.text:
Are those your pajamas? You're probably using old clothes for 
that, aren't you? I know it's economical, but in regards to Feng 
Shui, it would probably be better to buy some proper pajamas.
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>Are those your pajamas? You're probably using old clothes for 
<story>that, aren't you? I know it's economical, but in regards to Feng 
<story>Shui, it would probably be better to buy some proper pajamas.

data.text:
There's a bunch of other things too but…… 
for now, how about we start with all that!?
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>There's a bunch of other things too but…… 
<story>for now, how about we start with all that!?

data.text:
After that, following Copano Rickey's instructions, 
I moved a few things around and replaced some old stuff―
data.processed:
<story>After that, following Copano Rickey's instructions, 
<story>I moved a few things around and replaced some old stuff―

data.text: Alright……we're all finished!
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed: <story>Alright……we're all finished!

data.text:
Before I realized it, this place now 
had a rather tranquil feel to it……!
data.processed:
<story>Before I realized it, this place now 
<story>had a rather tranquil feel to it……!

data.text:
Ahaha! I get it, you can't really put it in to words, but it 
feels like something changed. Passively increasing that power, 
that's one of Feng Shui's specialties♪
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>Ahaha! I get it, you can't really put it in to words, but it 
<story>feels like something changed. Passively increasing that power, 
<story>that's one of Feng Shui's specialties♪

data.text:
If you can keep the room like this, then you'll 
definitely be Rickey☆ Lucky☆ and Happy like me!
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>If you can keep the room like this, then you'll 
<story>definitely be Rickey☆ Lucky☆ and Happy like me!

data.text: And then, several days later―
data.processed: <story>And then, several days later―

data.text:
Before I realized it, my head had cleared up and I felt full of 
energy. Maybe it was due to my physical condition, but I was 
feeling much more positive too.
data.processed:
<story>Before I realized it, my head had cleared up and I felt full of 
<story>energy. Maybe it was due to my physical condition, but I was 
<story>feeling much more positive too.

data.text:
Really!? I'm glad! Truth is, a little while ago, 
I went to check on the 『Horizontal Pressure』 in Trainer's room!
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>Really!? I'm glad! Truth is, a little while ago, 
<story>I went to check on the 『Horizontal Pressure』 in Trainer's room!

data.text:
Ah, the 『Horizontal Pressure』 is something that weighs 
down on your heart unconsciously while you're sleeping.
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>Ah, the 『Horizontal Pressure』 is something that weighs 
<story>down on your heart unconsciously while you're sleeping.

data.text:
For example, if you have lots of patterned cloth, it can 
unintentionally scatter your focus, and having a proper pillow 
cover instead of that towel can help you sleep soundly.
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>For example, if you have lots of patterned cloth, it can 
<story>unintentionally scatter your focus, and having a proper pillow 
<story>cover instead of that towel can help you sleep soundly.

data.text:
Just like this, little by little, by fixing 
the small imperfections, you'll be able to sleep 
well, and your fortunes will improve!
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>Just like this, little by little, by fixing 
<story>the small imperfections, you'll be able to sleep 
<story>well, and your fortunes will improve!

data.text:
This is Feng Shui's power to bring good luck, 
in other words 『The Science of Environmental Fortune』!
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>This is Feng Shui's power to bring good luck, 
<story>in other words 『The Science of Environmental Fortune』!

data.text:
By changing your environment, it'll change the way you think, and 
by doing that it can even change your personality and disposition.
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>By changing your environment, it'll change the way you think, and 
<story>by doing that it can even change your personality and disposition.

data.text:
That's why, if you want to become happy, you should start with 
your environment! ……but well, let's leave the explanation at that―
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>That's why, if you want to become happy, you should start with 
<story>your environment! ……but well, let's leave the explanation at that―

data.text:
How do you feel right now? Your thoughts are 
clear and bright! And feeling the energy welling 
up from within, that kind of feeling?
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>How do you feel right now? Your thoughts are 
<story>clear and bright! And feeling the energy welling 
<story>up from within, that kind of feeling?

data.text:
You definitely want to put this experience in to words and 
tell everyone right!? Right, right, isn't that right?
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>You definitely want to put this experience in to words and 
<story>tell everyone right!? Right, right, isn't that right?

data.text:
And so, we should strike while the iron's hot! 
Now, for Feng Shui publicity, let's go☆
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>And so, we should strike while the iron's hot! 
<story>Now, for Feng Shui publicity, let's go☆

data.text:
After that, with Copano Rickey dragging me around, we spent all 
day spreading the good word around the school grounds.
data.processed:
<story>After that, with Copano Rickey dragging me around, we spent all 
<story>day spreading the good word around the school grounds.
